achievements.text: Pioneered neurodivergent-first AI co-creation, translating GPT symbols into sacred art and intuitive design frameworks.
Created and tested over 50 AI-assisted tools including rituals, UX systems, and personal productivity models.
Developed emotionally intelligent interfaces and prompt engineering chains for trauma-informed healing content.
Demonstrated AI as a therapeutic translator and emotional UX guide for neurodivergent identity exploration.
Spearheaded technical debt cleanup and site migrations for small businesses and independent founders.
Created machine-learning-informed dashboards for cohort tracking and resource allocation metrics.
Integrated automated marketing workflows and gamified user flows to increase web-based conversions.
Coached founders on digital infrastructure modernization and AI-enhanced storytelling.
Applied Agile principles in an analog environment, prioritizing features and adjusting scope for a two-person off-grid build.
Navigated extreme resource constraints using systems thinking and trauma resilience to source water, power, and shelter.
Designed a thriving desert farm using indigenous Zuni waffle garden methods and reclaimed materials.
Managed a 2.5M P&L and directed product strategy for the Game Developer Network, supporting billions in annual revenue.
Built and scaled a global data warehouse and predictive analytics platform from 3 to 100+ internal stakeholders.
Led end to end RFP and deployment of global talent systems including Jobvite and multiple LMS platforms.
Championed user empathy by advocating for low-cost, dev-built solutions, cutting millions in unnecessary vendor spend.
Translated complex data models into accessible, iterative interfaces for non-technical users to remove SQL bottlenecks.
Led the end-to-end RFP, selection, and deployment of a global talent management system (Jobvite).
Successfully managed multiple Learning Management Systems (LMS) to drive skill development across a global workforce.
Managed client relationships and technical support for proprietary Learning Management Systems.
Bridged the gap between customer pain points and technical product requirements for early-stage platform features.
Progressed through foundational roles supporting media operations and executive leadership, gaining deep organizational insight.
Organized 100+ residents to catalyze legislative review of zoning laws targeting off-grid dwellings.
Secured 5,000 in grants for regenerative land-use and designed WordPress application stacks for food sovereignty.
Led transition from LLC to nonprofit, resolving financial inconsistencies and securing IRS compliance.

narrative_bridges.narrative: Transformed a career pause into a living R&D lab for AI-human collaboration. Mastered off-grid systems architecture and agentic AI workflows to build a modernized, resilient leadership toolkit.
